message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.IR 

This paper discusses the application of deep learning in argumentation mining, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the integration of symbolic and sub-symbolic methods, which involves reasoning and knowledge representation, indicating that it could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of statistical relational learning, which could place it under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) or cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
